explains: v. 成功；接替（succeed 的现在分词）
wordGroup: succeed in 成功；在…方面成功；顺利完成
succeed someone as 接任某人的职务
succeed at 成功方面，在…方面成功
succeed with 在方面取得成功
succeed in doing 成功地做了…，成功地做某事

sentences.en: They have small hope of succeeding.
We need to sift out the applications that have no chance of succeeding.
sentences.cn: 我们需要剔出那些成功无望的申请。

sentences.en: He had many a time heard of this thing succeeding but never of its failing before.
sentences.cn: 他曾多次听说这件事成功了，但从来没有听说过它的失败。
